title: Sophisticated Haven In A Premium Lifestyle Enclave - 705 San Tomas St
posting_body: Capture The Charm, Love The Space, Live The Location
This gorgeous home is located in a quiet neighborhood with many high-end upgrades.
Fully updated chef’s kitchen with designer white maple cabinets and quartz countertops, high-end stainless steel appliances, gas range, and copper plumbing.
Other amenities include central heating and air conditioning.
European wide plank white oak hardwood flooring and well-maintained carpet in bedrooms.
The gorgeous bathrooms feature contemporary vanities and designer porcelain tile.
This home is also built with modern doors and hardware, plenty of closet space, and double pane windows.
There is also a  large indoor laundry room with a washer and dryer.
Located next to the potential 6.5-acre park.
Best commute location, a short bike ride to Moffett Park(Google’s new office park) Apple, and Linkedin.
See for yourself what this home has to offer.
Schedule your showing before it’s gone.
** Tenant pays for electricity, water, gas, garbage, and cable/internet
** Security Deposit is equal to 1x the monthly rent based upon approved credit.
(NOTE: In CA, can increase security deposits to 2x rent.
